SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GENERALLY ACCEPTED ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES REQUIRE THE HOME TO EVALUATE THE LEVEL OF UNCERTAINTY RELATED TO WHETHER TAX POSITIONS TAKEN WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION. ANY POSITIONS TAKEN THAT DO NOT MEET THE MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THRESHOLD MUST BE QUANTIFIED AND RECORDED AS A LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IN THE ACCOMPANYING BALANCE SHEET ALONG WITH ANY ASSOCIATED INTEREST AND PENALTIES THAT WOULD BE PAYABLE TO THE TAXING AUTHORITIES UPON EXAMINATION. INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS ARE CLASSIFIED AS ADDITIONAL INCOME TAXES IN THE STATEMENT OF INCOME. THE HOME BELIEVES THAT NONE OF THE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN WOULD MATERIALLY IMPACT THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND NO SUCH LIABILITIES HAVE BEEN RECORDED.
CHANGE IN INVESTMENT OF THE OAKS FOUNDATION REPORTED ON 990, PAGE 12, LINE 9 -21,230.
INTERCOMPANY ADJUSTMENT - THE OAKS FOUNDATION 28,882. REIMBURSEMENT REVENUE FROM CRANDALL MEDICAL CENTER 1,902,240.
INTERCOMPANY ADJUSTMENT - THE OAKS FOUNDATION 28,882. EXPENSES INCURRED ON BEHALF OF CRANDALL MEDICAL CENTER 1,902,240.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT OF FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE ACCOUNTING MANAGER EACH YEAR. THE ORGANIZATION MAKES A COPY OF THIS DRAFTED FORM 990 AVAILABLE TO ALL GOVERNING BODY MEMBERS FOR REVIEW BEFORE APPROVING THE DRAFT AND SUBMITTING THE RETURN EACH YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPLIANCE IS MET BY THE DISCLOSURE TO THE BOARD ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION OF OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES IS REVIEWED AT THE ANNUAL BOARD MEETING AND A SALARY SURVEY IS DONE PERIODICALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE ALL AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
NET CHANGE IN INVESTMENT OF THE OAK -21,230.
THE ORGANIZATION'S FINANCE/AUDIT COMMITTEE OVERSEES THE AUDIT ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. THIS HAS NOT CHANGED SINCE THE PRIOR RETURN WAS FILED.
